tasks.task_reminder_text: It is time to think about painting the house.  Karate Kid style!
It is time to think about painting the fence.  Karate Kid style!
It is time to clean your home's rain gutters.  Get your mind IN the gutter!
It is time to power wash the windows and siding.  So you can see clearly...now.
It's been 3 years since you last refinished the deck.  Time for a weekend project :)
It's been 3 years since you last had your chimney swept.  This is a potential fire hazard!
It's time to get a 60,000 mile service checkup on your car.  You want everything to run in top shape, don't you?
It's time to get your annual State Inspectiom for your car.  You can't hide forever!
It's been 3 years since you've replaced your car battery.  Time to replace it before you get stuck!
Your car tires are 4 years old, time to replace them.  Better safe then sorry!
